General.Name: D I Corp
General.Description: D.I Corporation manufactures and supplies semiconductor testing equipment in South Korea. The company offers burn-in systems and testers, burn-in boards, and multi flexible testers for various devices. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

6.Name: Boo-Young  Heo
6.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Head of Research Center
